reviewText: Awesome service every thing was straight to the point and received shipment very fast and prompt. My kid loves the DVD and I love it also because it is Christian based unlike 99% of cartoons these days. Probably will buy another one soon.
I bought this movie for my son because of his love of monster trucks.  He asks to watch this movie everyday!  It was a major hit with him! : )

All my boys (2, 5, 9) love this show. It does clearly state Bible verses and is very entertaining to watch. The monster trucks talk and have childlike voices and they make mistakes like kids do and then learn from their mistakes.
4 year old enjoys watching this.  Trucks and a positive message.

My 6 year old son absolutely loves these.. Just told him I ordered him another video and he said "Thats what I'm talkin' bout" lol Funny one.. I really like these because I am teaching him about the Lord, and love that he enjoys it and it doesnt negate what I teach him from his kids Bible..
It's just okay. We just rented to see. I would not purchase.

I love these monster truck adventure episodes, especially because there are scriptures and Christian lessons.  I just bought this one for streaming and it has the scriptures at the end of each episode.  My 6 year old son has been watching these since he was three and still loves them!
We bought this on my son's small tv and didn't see the biblical part of the description.  I would rather teach him vs a television show.  It didn't keep my son entertained.
Only negative is that the episodes are short.
Gave this to my grandson for christmas and he still watches it.

Cant really leave a review as it never showed up. The other item I ordered did but not this but it wasn't the sellers fault it was fed ex.... Needless to say I would have done something else with the $10
Great story lines and great fun! Our 3 y/o son loves monster trucks so this one definitely has his attention!
